name: Suite
description: A spacious and luxurious room with a separate living area and bedroom. Suites often come with additional amenities such as a kitchenette, dining space, and may include special services

name: Adjoining Room
description: Two or more rooms with a connecting door, providing flexibility for larger groups or families. Guests can enjoy proximity while maintaining privacy.

name: Family Room
description: A room specifically designed for families, featuring larger beds and additional sleeping arrangements to accommodate parents and children comfortably.

name: Executive Room
description: A higher-tier room designed for business travelers, offering extra amenities and services such as a dedicated workspace, complimentary breakfast, and access to executive lounges.

name: Penthouse Suite
description: The most luxurious and spacious accommodation in the hotel. It often includes multiple bedrooms, a separate living area, dining space, and exclusive services for a truly upscale experience.

name: Presidential
description: The most luxurious and spacious accommodation in the hotel. It often includes multiple bedrooms, a separate living area, dining space, and exclusive services for a truly upscale experience.

name: Accessible Room
description: A room equipped with features to accommodate guests with disabilities. This may include wider doorways, handrails, and accessible bathroom facilities to ensure a comfortable stay for all.

name: Pet-Friendly Room
description: A room that allows guests to bring their pets. It may include pet-friendly amenities and services, such as pet beds and designated areas for walking pets

name: Standard Room
description: A comfortable room with essential amenities, suitable for individual travelers or couples. It typically includes a bed, bathroom, and basic furnishings.
